name: thelucie.ink
description: Webpack with stylelint config. Updated on 17.3.2022
author: Lukáš Chylík

scripts.bundle: npm run bundle:css && npm run build-prod
scripts.bundle:css: npm run stylelint && npm run bundle:global.css && npm run bundle:tattoo.css && npm run bundle:aftercare.css
scripts.bundle:global.css: npm run compile:global.scss && postcss wwwroot/css/style.css --config ./postcss.config.js | cleancss -o wwwroot/css/style.min.css
scripts.bundle:tattoo.css: npm run compile:tattoo.scss && postcss wwwroot/css/tattoo.css --config ./postcss.config.js | cleancss -o wwwroot/css/tattoo.min.css
scripts.bundle:aftercare.css: npm run compile:aftercare.scss && postcss wwwroot/css/aftercare.css --config ./postcss.config.js | cleancss -o wwwroot/css/aftercare.min.css
scripts.compile:scss: npm run compile:global.scss && npm run compile:tattoo.scss && npm run compile:aftercare.scss
scripts.watch:scss: npm run bundle:css & watch "npm run bundle:css" Resources/Stylesheets/Scss
